p: Exclusion criteria were: (1) Parkinsonism other than idiopathic PD. (2) Medical unfitness for graft procedure. (3) Active infection(s). (4) Human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) seropositivity. (5) Pregnant or nursing. (6) Self-reported substance abusers. (7) Previous neurosurgical history (e.g. DBS, pallidotomy, etc.). (8) Unsuited for this study in the neurologist's opinion.
